entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Peaceful protestors are getting tear gassed so you can cross the street and use a bible as a political photo prop... but hey, the stock market is up from the low it hit after you downplayed coronavirus and 109,000+ Americans died. That's something to brag about #Bunkerbaby
